metadata.name: Hidden Powershell in Link File Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects events that appear when a user click on a link file with a powershell command in it

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\explorer.exe') AND lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.lnk')))

output.summary: Detects events that appear when a user click on a link file with a powershell command in it

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate commands in .lnk files Reference: https://www.x86matthew.com/view_post?id=embed_exe_lnk
